author: Thibaut Simon, Media365
title: Turquie : L'ancien marseillais Ünder inscrit un quadruplé
text:
Thibaut Simon, Media365, publié le dimanche 07 janvier 2024 à 23h50
Transféré cet été au Fener, Cengiz Ünder s'est régalé ce dimanche en inscrivant quatre buts lors de la victoire à Istanbulspor (1-5).
OFFICIEL : Cengiz Ünder signe au Fenerbahce ! par footmercato
Blessé et peu utilisé lors de son arrivée en Turquie, l'ancien marseillais Cengiz Ünder retrouve du temps jeu avec le Fenerbahce depuis trois matchs . Ce dimanche sur la pelouse de la lanterne rouge Istanbulspor, le Turc a largement contribué au succès de son équipe en marquant à quatre reprises.
Ünder allume les mèches Très actif dès le début du match, Ünder va ouvrir le score à la 5ème minute d'une frappe splendide . Servi sur son côté droit, le gaucher repique dans l'axe en feintant à deux reprises avant de déclencher un missile dans la lucarne. Un début idéal pour lui et son équipe. Pas loin de récidiver à la 29ème en enroulant dans la surface, l'attaquant voit sa frappe détournée par le portier. Ünder profite quelques minutes plus tard d'une erreur de la défense. Son pressing oblige le défenseur à dégager, mais le pied du Turc contre le ballon qui file dans le but vide (33ème). Juste avant la pause, il termine son festival du premier acte par une seconde frappe en dehors de la surface . Même recette que sur le premier : récupération, course dans l'axe et frappe dans le petit filet (43ème). Il sera dans la combinaison du quatrième but de son équipe avec une talonnade magnifique pour Muldur qui offre à Dzeko son 13e but de la saison.
Fenerbahce toujours leader Il faudra moins d'une minute à Ünder en seconde période pour inscrire son quadruplé . Parti en contre, le Turc est servi par Szymanski. L'international turc enroule du gauche, la spéciale du jour pour clôturer le show. En 10 matchs disputés, Ünder en est désormais à cinq buts inscrits. Pour Fenerbahce, cette victoire permet de rester leader avec Galatasaray qui a pris les trois points un plus tard dans la soirée face à Konyaspor (3-0). Le duel continue entre les deux monuments du football turc.

author: 盛天网络官微
title: 《星之翼》现已登陆Epic游戏平台
text:
盛天网络 （ 300494 ）旗下原创机甲IP《星之翼》今日正式登陆全球知名游戏平台Epic！
　　作为“机甲美少女+GVG格斗”玩法的热门之作，自2024年4月18日国内首发以来，《星之翼》已先后拓展至Steam、移动端（App Store/Google Play）等多个平台，并于2024年11月进军日本市场，以“上线首月登上日本双应用商店（App Store/Google Play）榜单亚军、跻身Steam日区热销榜前二”的亮眼成绩，迅速打开海外市场。
　　上线一周年之际，游戏与日本寿屋旗下经典IP《机甲少女FRAME ARMS GIRL》的跨界联动更是引发圈内热潮，不仅引发玩家热议，更直接推动《星之翼》登顶Steam日区热销榜首，创下又一亮眼成绩。
　　此次登陆Epic平台，依托该平台覆盖全球超2.95亿用户的生态优势，《星之翼》将进一步加速海外市场渗透，不断巩固在二次元机甲赛道的领先地位。

author: Community News Releases
title: Miami Dade College Names Dr. Maryam Laguna Borrego Senior Vice President and Chief Operating Officer
text:
Miami Dade College (MDC) is delighted to announce the appointment of Dr. Maryam Laguna Borrego as Senior Vice President and Chief Operating Officer (COO) . Dr. Borrego will lead the operational and strategic functions of one of the nation’s most prominent higher education institutions, serving over 120,000 students across eight campuses and numerous outreach centers.
As COO, Dr. Borrego will oversee critical divisions, including Business Affairs, Facilities, Human Resources and Organizational Development, Information Technology, Government Affairs, Cultural Affairs, Marketing and Communications and The Idea Center, MDC’s renowned hub for innovation and entrepreneurship. She will guide these areas to ensure seamless alignment with the College’s strategic priorities, fostering operational excellence and sustainable growth.
“Maryam is an exceptional leader with vision, expertise and steadfast dedication to our students and community,” said MDC President Madeline Pumariega . “Her deep institutional knowledge and proven ability to lead complex initiatives will be pivotal in continuing to advance our mission.”
Dr. Borrego has been a transformative leader at MDC, delivering impactful results through her strategic acumen and unwavering commitment to the College’s mission. In her expanded capacity, she will retain her role as Chief of Staff to President Pumariega while driving initiatives that enhance operational efficiency, financial resilience and institutional innovation.
Dr. Borrego’s promotion underscores MDC’s commitment to cultivating visionary leadership that drives transformative progress and growing high-performing professionals from within at every opportunity. During her tenure, she has spearheaded initiatives such as the Presidential Leadership Academy, facilitated landmark community partnerships and managed major infrastructure projects, all of which have contributed to MDC’s enduring success and community impact.
“I am honored to assume this role and to further Miami Dade College’s mission of transforming lives through education,” said Dr. Borrego . “Together with our dedicated team, we will continue building upon MDC’s legacy of excellence, innovation and opportunity for all.”

author: @Masrawy
title: نجاة 31 عاملًا بعد انهيار نفق صناعي في لوس أنجلوس (فيديو) | مصراوى
text:
رويترز
أكد مسؤولون في مدينة لوس أنجلوس الأمريكية، في وقت متأخر من مساء الأربعاء، نجاة جميع العمال البالغ عددهم 31 دون إصابات، بعد انهيار نفق صناعي في منطقة ويلمنجتون، حيث تمكنوا من تسلق كومة من التربة الجوفية السائبة والفرار من الموقع، حسب ما أوردته وكالة رويترز.
وأوضحت إدارة الإطفاء في بيان أن العمال المحاصرين نجحوا في الوصول إلى نقطة دخول النفق الواقعة على بُعد أكثر من خمسة أميال (نحو 8 كيلومترات) من موقع الانهيار، بعد أن تمكنوا من الهرب عبر الجزء السليم من النفق والالتحاق بزملائهم هناك.
وقال قائد الإطفاء في لوس أنجلوس، روني فيلانويفا، في مؤتمر صحفي، إن 27 عاملًا كانوا محاصرين داخل النفق الذي يبلغ قطره نحو 18 قدمًا (5.5 مترًا)، فيما دخل أربعة آخرون المنطقة المتضررة للمشاركة في جهود الإنقاذ.
وأضاف فيلانويفا: "كان على العمال أن يتسلقوا عبر الأنقاض ويخرجوا بأنفسهم، قبل أن تصل إليهم فرق المساعدة".
من جهته، أوضح روبرت فيرانتي، كبير المهندسين والمدير العام لمناطق الصرف الصحي في مقاطعة لوس أنجلوس، أن الانهيار الجزئي وقع في جزء تم تشييده مسبقًا من النفق، بسبب ظروف أرضية مضغوطة.
وعلى منصة "إكس"، أعربت عمدة لوس أنجلوس، كارين باس، عن امتنانها لفرق الطوارئ، وقالت: "أفادت إدارة الإطفاء أن جميع العمال المحاصرين قد خرجوا وتم تحديد مصيرهم. تحدثت مع عدد منهم للتو. شكرًا لجميع المستجيبين الأوائل الشجعان الذين تصرفوا بسرعة".
LAFD has just reported that all workers who were trapped in the tunnel in Wilmington are now out and accounted for.
I just spoke with many of the workers who were trapped. Thank you to all of our brave first responders who acted immediately. You are L.A.'s true heroes. pic.twitter.com/6hdAwbH1MI
— Mayor Karen Bass (@MayorOfLA) July 10, 2025
وأضاف المسؤولون أن القسم المنهار كان جزءًا من مشروع كليرووتر في مقاطعة لوس أنجلوس، حيث يتم بناء نفق جديد بطول 7 أميال لتطوير نظام الصرف الصحي في المنطقة.
topics: Disaster and Accident->industrial accident and incident

author: @GdB_it
title: Soldati spararono a ostaggio 15 minuti dopo aver ucciso altri 2 - Giornale di brescia
text: Soldati spararono a ostaggio 15 minuti dopo aver ucciso altri 2 ROMA, 28 DIC - Yotam Haim, uno dei tre ostaggi uccisi dai soldati israeliani nella Striscia di Gaza due settimane fa, è stato ucciso a colpi di arma da fuoco circa 15 minuti dopo gli altri due, secondo un'indagine dell'esercito i cui risultati sono stati pubblicati stasera. Durante quel quarto d'ora, dice il rapporto citato da Haaretz, il comandante del battaglione ha esortato Haim a lasciare l'edificio in cui si era rifugiato dopo che gli altri due, Samer El-Talalka e Alon Shamriz, erano stati uccisi. Ma quando è emerso, è stato colpito da due soldati nonostante il comandante avesse ordinato loro di non sparare, ed è morto sul colpo. I risultati sono stati presentati giovedì alle famiglie delle tre vittime. - [Leggi qui](https://edicola.giornaledibrescia.it/giornalebrescia/newsstand?int_source=leggiqui&int_medium=link&int_campaing=linkinterno&int_content=leggi_qui_il_gdb_in_edicola_oggi)il GdB in edicola oggi - [Iscriviti alle newsletter del GdB](/newsletter/iscriviti). author: Giant Bicycles
title: Berrade Scores Third Vuelta Stage Win for Kern Pharma! | Giant Bicycles Moldova
text: Four of the top-10 finishers on Stage 18 were all on Giant [Propel Advanced SL bikes](https://www.giant-bicycles.com/global/showcase/propel-advanced-sl) with [CADEX WheelSystems](https://www.cadex-cycling.com/global), with Mauro Schmid from Team Jayco AlUla finishing second. Berrade’s teammates Pablo Castrillo and Pau Miquel were also in the front group, finishing eighth and ninth respectively. Castrillo Climbs to New Heights Berrade’s victory follows two incredible stage wins from his teammate Castrillo, who broke through for his first pro victory on Stage 12 with a superb climbing display and solo attack in the final 10km. The 23-year-old was part of a 10-man break that went clear 27km into the shortest stage of this year’s Vuelta, a 137km race from Ourense to a summit finish atop Montaña de Manzaneda. That Stage 12 victory was the biggest win of Castrillo’s career to date, and also of his Giant-sponsored Spanish squad. It was an emotional day for the team, whose former team president and founder Manolo Azcona had passed away the previous day. “Honestly, I still don’t believe it,” said Castrillo, who wore his [Giant Rev Pro](https://www.giant-bicycles.com/global/showcase/rev-pro) helmet for the win. “I’ve won my first stage at the Vuelta. I’m going to dedicate the victory to my team, my family, and a very special person, Azcona, who died last night, and I was thinking about him today.” Three days later Castrillo struck again, launching a solo attack 3km from the summit finish of Stage 15 to Cuito Negru. In a thrilling battle with Russian Aleksandr Vlasov, the Spaniard proved strongest again, conquering the brutally steep 20 percent grades in the final kilometer to earn another career win in his home country. “I am speechless,” Castrillo said after the win. “Winning this second stage, on such a climb and with such tough rivals, is something incredible. It is something I will remember for the rest of my life.” Kern Pharma Shines Kern Pharma, a team that Giant has sponsored since the squad was founded in 2020 and has partnered with Giant for its [Grassroots development program](https://www.giant-bicycles.com/global/teams-and-riders/grassroots-program/289), was already riding high in the final week of its home nation grand tour. But the underdog squad wasn’t content to rest on their laurels, they had set their sights on achieving more. This time it was Berrade’s turn to score his first professional win. He and his teammates Castrillo and Miquel were also part of a 42-rider breakaway that formed early in Stage 18, a hilly route through the Basque Country of northern Spain. That group got whittled down as the riders tackled several categorized climbs on their way to the finish at Maestu-Parque Natural de Izki. Following a series of attacks and counter-attacks, a lead group of 13 survivors, including the Kern-Pharma trio of Berrade, Castrillo and Miquel, along with Team Jayco-AlUla rider Mauro Schmid, was set for the final showdown. Schmid, the Swiss national road champion, had been active throughout the Vuelta and already had an impressive second-place finish on Stage 13. That result came two days after his Jayco AlUla teammate [Eddie Dunbar won Stage 11](https://www.giant-bicycles.com/global/news/dunbar-takes-stage-win-at-vuelta-a-espana/29108), another big result for riders on Giant bikes. Hitting the final climb with 6km to go, Dutch rider Steven Kruijswijk was the first to attack. He was quickly joined by Berrade, and halfway up the climb the Spanish rider went solo. He continued to pour it on, gaining a 15-second gap and then holding it to the line to score his first professional win since he turned pro in 2019. “At the beginning of the Vuelta, our manager told me that I had to become famous,” Berrade said after his win. “I said that it’s difficult for me, because I’m not a big media guy, but I think with this victory maybe I have a chance.” Berrade Scores Third Vuelta Stage Win for Kern Pharma! joi, 5 septembrie 2024 Giant Urko Berrade gave the Kern Pharma team its third stage win at the Vuelta a España, winning Stage 18 from a breakaway to continue the upstart Giant-sponsored team’s storybook run at the Spanish grand tour.
